channel.title: [711] Trading Interfaces
channel.description:
Im on 711 NRS3server Client and the trading interfaces are messed up. Basically what im telling you is that nobody can trade with the interface on both sides.
Example -
sdfgsd Wants to trade with you.
*Other Player Right clicks accept*
sdfgsd would be the one with the trade interface on his screen and the other player would be sitting there with nothing on his screen.
If you need more info or example ill make a quick vid or somethin :) please help
